system.description: Vanguards are stalwart defenders who protect their allies from harm. Their ability to absorb damage and control the battlefield makes them invaluable frontline tanks.

features.name: Shield Wall
features.description: While you have a Shield equipped, you have +1 Armor, and Allies within 5 feet of you have +1 to their Block Saves.

features.name: Protector
features.description: You gain the Sentinel Perk. When an Ally within 5 feet is targeted by an attack, you can use your Reaction to become the target instead.

features.name: Taunt
features.description: As an Action, you can taunt a Near Enemy. Until the end of your next Turn, it has Hinder on attacks that don't include you as a Target.

features.name: Resolute
features.description: You have Favor on Saves against being Frightened, Charmed, or moved against your will.

features.name: Hold the Line
features.description: Enemies provoke an Opportunity Attack from you when they move while within your Reach, even if they Disengage.

features.name: Bulwark
features.description: While you have a Shield equipped, you reduce all damage you take by 2 per damage die.

features.name: Immovable
features.description: You cannot be moved against your will, and you cannot be knocked Prone. Additionally, your Shield Wall bonus increases to +2 Armor and +2 to Block Saves.
